fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Set up a Trap at someone's house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player with a trap is visited, the trap will trigger, telling you the role of every visitor.
- If a player with a trap is attacked, the trap will trigger, attacking the attacker and granting your target Powerful defense.
- You may have many traps out at a time.
